awards.title: DOE EnergyTech University Prize 2024 Faculty Explorer Award
awards.summary: The EnergyTech University Prize Faculty Explorer Award recognizes faculty for novel, impactful proposals to develop and implement educational activities to engage more students in energy technology commercialization and entrepreneurship topics at their institution

awards.title: Above and Beyond Awards
awards.summary: Energetics gives 'Above and Beyond' awards annually for employees demonstrating outstanding job performance that goes above and beyond normal job duties, contributing to success and reputation growth for the company. Received in 2015, 2016, 2021, and 2022.

awards.title: DOE Secretary’s Appreciation Award
awards.summary: Awarded by the Secretary of Energy, this award was given for 'exceptional efforts' to prepare the U.S. Department of Energy's 2015 Quadrennial Technology Review

awards.title: DOT Secretary’s Honor Award
awards.summary: Awarded by the Secretary of Transportation, this award was given in recognition of community engagement as a STEM mentor and job skills coach for at-risk youth in Washington, DC

awards.title: Helmut Weymann Prize
awards.summary: Awarded by the Mechanical Engineering Department, the Helmut Weymann Prize is awarded to a graduating senior who has demonstrated exceptional ingenuity and skill in engineering experimentation as an undergraduate student
